#summary Bug4J.

= Welcome to Bug4J =

Bug4J is made of an agent embedded in your application that automatically reports bugs to a server.

The server has a reporting interface and can optionally connected to a bug database to automatically report defects.

http://bug4j.googlecode.com/svn/files/topology.png

= Embedding the Agent with Log4J =

The easiest route is to plug the Bug4J agent into Log4J.
{{{
# Set root logger level to DEBUG and its only appender to A1.
log4j.rootLogger=INFO, A1, BUG4J

# A1 is set to be a ConsoleAppender.
log4j.appender.A1=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender

# A1 uses PatternLayout.
log4j.appender.A1.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
log4j.appender.A1.layout.ConversionPattern=%-4r [%t] %-5p %c %x - %m%n

log4j.appender.BUG4J=org.dandoy.bug4j.client.Bug4jAppender
log4j.appender.BUG4J.server=http://127.0.0.1:8063/
log4j.appender.BUG4J.applicationName=My Application
log4j.appender.BUG4J.applicationVersion=1.3
}}}
